title: Pull Request Review Detection Config
description: Defines settings for automated detection of improper pull request review.

labels.description: List of labels that will be added to the triggering pull request.

reviewerPool.description: List of users from which the code will try to pick a reviewer, such that the reviewer isn't also the author of the commits.

backupReviewer.description: Backup reviewer that will be assigned if no reviewer from reviewerPool can be assigned. Optional, if left as null - will not be used.

selfReviewed.description: Message shown when the pull request appears to be self-reviewed.

notReviewed.description: Message shown when the pull request appears to have no review at all.

assignReviewer.description: Additional message shown in all situations if an appropriate reviewer can be designated. The message will include an '@assigned_reviewer' mention at the beginning.

noReviewer.description: Message shown when no appropriate reviewer from the reviewer pool can be assigned. A backup reviewer will be assigned, if one is designated.
